select
from dj_clue_talk where data_status='0' and clue_id=#{clue_id} ORDER BY modify_date DESC
SELECT max(modify_date) from dj_clue_talk where data_status='0' and clue_id=#{clue_id}

SELECT ct.id, ct.clue_id AS clueId, ct.user_id AS userId, ct.talk_content AS talkContent, ct.create_date AS createDate, ct.modify_date AS modifyDate, ct.data_status AS dataStatus, ct.remind_time AS remindTime, u.member_id AS memberId, c.stage as stage, c.phase_status as phaseStatus, c.phone as phone FROM dj_clue_talk ct INNER JOIN dj_clue c ON ct.clue_id = c.id INNER JOIN dj_user u ON ct.user_id = u.id WHERE DATE_FORMAT(remind_time, '%y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%y-%m-%d')
